description:
http://anidb.net/ch29508 [Mie] is a beautiful widow, still young, she lost her husband due to an accident and the only family left is her beloved daughter http://anidb.net/ch33057 [Arisa]. She runs a restaurant pretty much by herself, the only employee is her chef http://anidb.net/ch33058 [Kouji]. Arisa is in love with Kouji and they recently got intimate.
One day http://anidb.net/ch29508 [Mie] is caught masturbating by http://anidb.net/ch33057 [Arisa], she is a woman after all and is quite lonely since her husband died. Arisa has noticed her mother likes http://anidb.net/ch33058 [Kouji] and he likes her mother, she then decides to help her mother satiate her sexual desires...
